translations: n.<英>不规则四边形；<美>梯形；（腕部近食指根底处的）小多角骨
adj.梯形的，不规则四边形的

phrs.translation: 梯形, 梯形失真, 不规则四边形, 小多角骨
直角梯形, 度角梯型
等腰梯形, 等腰梯型, 两条非平行边相等的梯形
梯形螺杆泵, 梯型螺杆泵
梯形公式, 梯形法, 梯形试样法

sentences.sentence: Fairy lights dance around the trapezoid opening at the top of the Shanghai World Financial Center (SWFC).
sentences.translation: 在上海环球金融中心（SWFC）顶部，彩灯围绕着梯形的开口舞动。

sentences.sentence: The two unequal shorter sides of the curvilinear trapezoid of each building change their geometry every two floors.
sentences.translation: 每隔两层，每幢建筑曲线梯形的两条不相等的短边就会改变其几何形状。

sentences.sentence: The 31-inches main circular window is the biggest window ever bound for space. The six windows on the perimeter are trapezoid-shaped.
sentences.translation: 31英寸宽的主圆窗，是有史以来最大的窗户。四周的六扇窗户是梯形的。
